properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 12:06PM CST until January 28 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* until Monday, January 27.
* At 11 AM Saturday the stage was 39.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 39.5 feet on Sunday, January 19.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* The river is near crest and will remain between 39.0 and 39.5 feet
into early next week, then begin a slow fall. The river is
forecast to remain above flood stage through late January.
* At 40.0 feet...In Tennessee, long sections of Tiptonville Ferry
Road are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
